page.title: 18FAMILY LIFE 2
page.content: Tim and Simon come back from school at about 12.15pm for lunch.She prepares their dinner and then washes up.In the evenings she goes to the Wellcliffes or sometimes for a meal.She gets home at 1.am and goes straight to bed. Tim goes to athletics everyweek.He takes Oliver and the dog Digby out for walks.He goes to Arundel swimming pool.It costs 85p for a day ticket.Simon and Tim babysit when their Mum and stepfather go out in the evenings.Most days Tim watches T.V. or rides his B.M.X.Tim gets up at 8am and comes home from school at 3.50.He sometimes goes breakdancing with his brother. By Joanna Cudlipp and Amanda Ashman.
